name: Tintin: Destination Adventure
summary: Tintin: Destination Adventure is a video game loosely based on the series The Adventures of Tintin, the comics series by Belgian cartoonist Hergé. It was released for Microsoft Windows and PlayStation in Europe in late 2001.
